description: Moors Murderer Ian Brady reportedly asked in his will for his cremated ashes to be scattered on Glasgow's river Clyde and for money raised from publishing his memoirs to go to charity.
title: Moors Murderer Ian Brady reportedly asked for money from his memoirs to go to pet charity

author: Sarah Whitehead
description: Ashworth hospital staff talk of difficulty in setting aside the crimes of the Moors murderer to treat him like any other patient
title: Ian Brady's psychiatric nurses speak of 'daily miracle' of treating him

author: Katie Butler
description: The Moors Murderer's inquest was held in the North West earlier this week but when asked if they would do it Sefton Council said 'the simple answer is no'
title: Councils across the country are refusing to cremate the body of Ian Brady

author: Phil Cardy
description: Moors Murderer's trial run on boy, 7, a year before his killing spree began in earnest after car deliberately clipped him while he was walking home from a sweet shop in 1962
title: Evil Ian Brady knocked me off the pavement and molested me before killing spree
